title: Patch going SUPER slow
body: 100 minutes for a 200 mega byte patch? Riot HELP ME.

replies.body: Unless you're getting any errors, it's best to leave the patcher alone.  Cancelling out early can cause it to rescan your game files for corruption before proceeding with another update.  When finished, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten your connection to the patching server for future updates.
